text.text: All bows have quite different stats from their melee and harvest counterparts
The first is Draw Weight - Draw Weight refers to how quickly the bow returns to its original, undrawn, position. A higher draw weight means the faster the arrows go!
Next is Draw Speed - Draw speed is how easily you can draw your bow. The higher this is, the faster you'll draw.
Finally, there's Accuracy - Accuracy means how little arrows from this bow will deviate from the intended trajectory.
